evidence.text: Joint Motion to Dismiss – The parties, Defendant Hampton Roads Regional Jail Authority ("HRRJA"), and Plaintiff, United States, by counsel, hereby move this court to dismiss the above-captioned matter with prejudice.

add_extracted.value: Defendant: dismiss the case with prejudice
